title: The Baptism of Christ
provenance_text:
Alexandre-Pierre François Robert-Dumesnil (Paris 1778-1864, no mark); Sir John St. Aubyn (London 1758-1839, no mark); John Malcolm (London 1805-1893) Lugt 1780; British Museum duplicate, Lugt 305; Knoedler XIIIth Annual, no. 5; A. J. Ryan; Bequest of Charles J. Rosenbloom (Lugt Suppl. 633b), Pittsburgh, PA, 1974.

Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), until April 1, 1973; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Under review by CGK.

creator.death_place: Breisach am Rhein (Freiburg district, Baden-Württemberg, Germany)
